Room at the Top is a 2012 BBC television adaptation by Amanda Coe of John Braine's novel of the same name, with a cast led by Matthew McNulty, Maxine Peake and Jenna-Louise Coleman, and directed by Aisling Walsh.

It aired in two parts on 26 and 27 September 2012 on BBC Four
